name: Zumb.io
description:
The game is in SuperAlpha release, just simple mechanics and zombies, the future of the game is: 

- Base management, Rescue survivors, online by waves (like cod), online PvP, build and grow your base, gather supriments, this kind of stuff.

The game is in portuguese, but that won't be a problem. 

Use your mouse to aim, WASD to move, R to reload, click to shoot, basic stuff...

The goal is to get out of the shitty place you are!

Donate if you want to see the future of the project

Keep playing :D
